article.headline: Radford 81, Bowling Green 63
article.story: BLACKSBURG, Va. (AP) -- Whit Holcomb-Faye scored 27 points Sunday as Radford defeated Bowling Green 81-63 in the third round of the NABC Classic. Radford (2-1) and Bowling Green (1-2) traded baskets for most of the first half, wihich ended with the Highlanders leading 36-33. Bowling Green was plagued with foul trouble, with three players with three fouls each at the break. The Highlanders stretched the lead to 55-47 with 10:54 left on a Duane Ricks dunk off a Holcomb-Faye feed and gradually built the margin to as many as 20. The Falcons, who were led by Martin Samarco's 16 points, shot only 38 percent to Radford's 55 percent. Radford scored 22 points off 21 Bowling Green turnovers. Chris Oliver added 18 points and Reggie McIntyre scored 14 for the Highlanders. Ricks had 12 points and 10 rebounds. Erik Marschall scored 14 points and John Floyd added 13 for Bowling Green.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
